CleanBoard is a tool provided for personal, non-commercial use. You are responsible for any text you type using the keyboard. We do not monitor or control the content you create.

2. "As Is" Basis

The application is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind. While we strive for accuracy in our transliteration and suggestions, we do not guarantee that the app will always function perfectly or be error-free.

3. Privacy

Your use of the app is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which states that we do not collect any of your data.

4. Intellectual Property

5. Changes to Terms
